content: this luminous shawl is created using only knit purl simple increases and slipped stitches the increases occur on the right side only making a nice shape with neat edges that knits up quite quickly with truboo yarn the pattern is very easy to memorize and travel with-the three different sections of textures work together like a classic rondo a-b-a-c-a with a beautiful coda and picot bind off to end the piece
